jump_scares.spoiler: Buzz bumps into a beam in the dark looking for an exit
A hand reached out under the Funhouse bunting and grabs Joey
The Funhouse electricity kicks on causing the animatronic monsters to move and the loud thunder and lightning sound effects to turn on
A skeleton leaps out of the floor and a rope drops around Richie’s neck
Liz falls screaming through a trap door
As Buzz attempts to comfort Amy, the monster-son falls between them and attacks Amy
The father, impaled on the sword grabs Buzz
Amy is started by the monster-son lurking amongst the Funhouse animatronic characters
The monster breaks through a locked door
A piece of equipment falls from the upper mechanical deck
A wooden ladder slam onto the floor in front of Amy
Even with the power cut, The Fat Lady starts moving and cackling and surprises Amy
The sound of steam releasing from a pump startles Liz

In an homage to both John Carpenter’s classic Halloween (1978) and Hitchcock’s Psycho (1960) young Joey sneaks into the bathroom dressed as a maniacal clown, rips back the shower curtain, raises a knife, and surprises his horrified sister
The son of the carny tears his Frankenstein mask off revealing his disfigured face
Joey is startled by a menacing dog
A magician scares the audience when an volunteer from the audience steps into The Impaler and gets a stake hammered into the her heart
A creepy man offers Joey a ride then unexpectedly points a shotgun at him
